    Success Stories

    Thoroughly Impressed

    "John was extremely courteous and professional. He would work on any area of the course that our daughter was concerned with and was not afraid to step outside his comfort zone by assisting with related subjects where he could.

    Our daughter achieved a B in her Highers, which we are over the moon about. We were thoroughly impressed with John throughout and would wholeheartedly recommend him."

    Andy, Busby

    Lightbulb Moment

    "John put Sarah at ease from the first session. He quickly built a rapport with her and got to work on the areas she was struggling with.

    Sarah was having difficulty with fractions, and in the first hour John provided a "lightbulb moment" by explaining it to her in a way she could easily understand.

    As a result of John's help over 12 lessons and Sarah's hard work, she passed her Standard Grade Credit, a result we're both very pleased with."

    Kathryn, Giffnock

    A Pushover

    "As a result of all our practice and my finally understanding the subject, I found the exam a pushover. With your help, I got an A at Intermediate 2. Thank you!"

    James, Carmunnock

    Location

    I only offer tuition at my home in Shawlands in the South Side of Glasgow.

    My home has a dedicated office which provides a calm, quiet space free from interruptions - perfect for productive lessons.
